About Us Ocean Prime is a nationally acclaimed, dynamic seafood and steakhouse from the award-winning Cameron Mitchell Restaurants. Ocean Prime delivers an elevated experience with exceptional ambiance, a chef-curated menu, signature handcrafted cocktails, a Wine Spectator honored wine list and genuine hospitality. Our Story slider 1993 Cameron Mitchell signed a lease for a small piece of storefront property, tucked in the northwest corner of Columbus, OH. The space would be transformed into our first restaurant, “Cameron’s.” This contemporary American bistro wowed Columbus diners with diverse flavors selected from across the American culinary landscape as well as extraordinary attention to service. 1993 Cameron Mitchell signed a lease for a small piece of storefront property, tucked in the northwest corner of Columbus, OH. The space would be transformed into our first restaurant, “Cameron’s.” This contemporary American bistro wowed Columbus diners with diverse flavors selected from across the American culinary landscape as well as extraordinary attention to service. content copy content card swiper slide slider 1994-1998 With the success of Cameron’s American Bistro, Cameron Mitchell Restaurants (CMR) opened 7 additional restaurant concepts ranging from an upscale diner to Italian, Steak, and more. 1994-1998 With the success of Cameron’s American Bistro, Cameron Mitchell Restaurants (CMR) opened 7 additional restaurant concepts ranging from an upscale diner to Italian, Steak, and more. content copy content card swiper slide slider 1999 Cameron Mitchell Restaurants opened “The Ocean Club” at Easton Town Center in Columbus, OH, an oceanic ambiance featuring new American seafood with coastal cuisine fusions. 1999 Cameron Mitchell Restaurants opened “The Ocean Club” at Easton Town Center in Columbus, OH, an oceanic ambiance featuring new American seafood with coastal cuisine fusions. content copy content card swiper slide slider 1999 - 2006 Between 1999 and 2006, CMR opened 23 restaurants under 9 different concepts in 16 cities. This growth also included the expansion of Mitchell’s Fish Market, Cameron’s Steakhouse, Mitchell’s Steakhouse, and Columbus Fish Market, which were sold to Ruth’s Hospitality Group in 2008 (now owned by Landry’s). 1999 - 2006 Between 1999 and 2006, CMR opened 23 restaurants under 9 different concepts in 16 cities. This growth also included the expansion of Mitchell’s Fish Market, Cameron’s Steakhouse, Mitchell’s Steakhouse, and Columbus Fish Market, which were sold to Ruth’s Hospitality Group in 2008 (now owned by Landry’s). content copy content card swiper slide slider 2006 After 7 years, The Ocean Club concept was reimagined and re-concepted to Mitchell’s Ocean Club, with a new menu, logo and design combining a traditional, modern steakhouse with the finest seafood and lively lounge environment. 2006 After 7 years, The Ocean Club concept was reimagined and re-concepted to Mitchell’s Ocean Club, with a new menu, logo and design combining a traditional, modern steakhouse with the finest seafood and lively lounge environment. content copy content card swiper slide slider 2008 - 2013 With the sale of the Fish Market & Steakhouse locations, CMR was ready to expand once again. In 2008, the first Ocean Prime opened in Troy, Michigan, inspired by Mitchell’s Ocean Club. Between 2008 and 2013, nine more Ocean Prime locations opened in seven states. 2008 - 2013 With the sale of the Fish Market & Steakhouse locations, CMR was ready to expand once again. In 2008, the first Ocean Prime opened in Troy, Michigan, inspired by Mitchell’s Ocean Club. Between 2008 and 2013, nine more Ocean Prime locations opened in seven states. content copy content card swiper slide slider 2014 - 2015 Ocean Prime expanded coast-to-coast with flagship locations in Beverly Hills, California (2014) and New York, New York (2015). 2014 - 2015 Ocean Prime expanded coast-to-coast with flagship locations in Beverly Hills, California (2014) and New York, New York (2015). content copy content card swiper slide slider 2016 - 2019 CMR continued to expand the Ocean Prime brand with locations in metropolitan cities of Boston, Massachusetts, Washington, D.C., Naples, Florida, Greenwood Village, Colorado, and Chicago, Illinois. Celebrating the company’s 25th anniversary in 2018, Cameron Mitchell published “Yes is the Answer, What is the Question?” which was rated one of the “Top 12 Business Memoirs of All Time” by Forbes. 2016 - 2019 CMR continued to expand the Ocean Prime brand with locations in metropolitan cities of Boston, Massachusetts, Washington, D.C., Naples, Florida, Greenwood Village, Colorado, and Chicago, Illinois. Celebrating the company’s 25th anniversary in 2018, Cameron Mitchell published “Yes is the Answer, What is the Question?” which was rated one of the “Top 12 Business Memoirs of All Time” by Forbes. content copy content card swiper slide slider 2020 In March 2020 when the COVID-19 pandemic impacted the world, CMR temporarily closed all restaurants and furloughed more than 4,500 associates. During this time, Cameron Mitchell was a valuable voice for the industry, having lobbied state and national legislators for PPP loans and loan forgiveness amendments to enable thousands of restaurants across the country to survive. Throughout the pandemic, Cameron was also a regular contributor to many national broadcast segments including CNN, CNBC, Fox, and more. CMR restaurants began to reopen in May, following local guidelines in each market. 2020 In March 2020 when the COVID-19 pandemic impacted the world, CMR temporarily closed all restaurants and furloughed more than 4,500 associates. During this time, Cameron Mitchell was a valuable voice for the industry, having lobbied state and national legislators for PPP loans and loan forgiveness amendments to enable thousands of restaurants across the country to survive. Throughout the pandemic, Cameron was also a regular contributor to many national broadcast segments including CNN, CNBC, Fox, and more. CMR restaurants began to reopen in May, following local guidelines in each market. content copy content card swiper slide slider 2021 - 2022 With the return of dining out and “comeback” of the industry, our company refocused on creating extraordinary restaurants and opened five additional locations in three states, including Prime Social, a lively rooftop cocktail lounge in Kansas City, Missouri -- a sister-concept to Ocean Prime. 2021 - 2022 With the return of dining out and “comeback” of the industry, our company refocused on creating extraordinary restaurants and opened five additional locations in three states, including Prime Social, a lively rooftop cocktail lounge in Kansas City, Missouri -- a sister-concept to Ocean Prime. content copy content card swiper slide slider 2025 & Beyond Ocean Prime’s growth continues with its newest location at Las Olas Marina in Fort Lauderdale, which debuted in spring 2025. The expansion doesn’t stop there—another Ocean Prime is set to open in Nashville, Tennessee, in fall 2025. 2025 & Beyond Ocean Prime’s growth continues with its newest location at Las Olas Marina in Fort Lauderdale, which debuted in spring 2025. The expansion doesn’t stop there—another Ocean Prime is set to open in Nashville, Tennessee, in fall 2025. content copy content card swiper slide swiper-wrapper Pagination 1993 1994-1998 1999 1999 - 2006 2006 2008 - 2013 2014 - 2015 2016 - 2019 2020 2021 - 2022 2025 & Beyond Pagination swiper-container grid Our People Our guests can expect best-in-class hospitality from our passionate and knowledgeable associates coast-to-coast. Embracing our midwestern roots, we place the highest value on our people. We care deeply about delivering genuine hospitality and believe that every member of our team is essential to creating a memorable Ocean Prime experience. We empower our associates to say “Yes is the answer. Ocean Prime is committed to the growth of the communities in which we do business. In addition to our continuous philanthropic efforts, it is our mission to provide as much support as possible to a wide variety of schools, non-profit groups and community organizations with a particular focus on families and children, education, health, safety and hunger.
